author: jtaylor
msg: Building of FO/PDF now uses xalan from lib.repo, no longer requires ant's
Also the target has been broken into two stages, maven:fo and maven:pdf. This
allows one to generate fo and then process them with something other than fop.
(Since fop is still missing some major features -- like non fixed layout tables)

author: dion
msg: Added other stuff that the build creates

author: dion
msg: Split code up into more appropriate classes
